description: With the beautiful presentation of this cocktail alone, you’ll know this is going to be your new favorite. The fresh raspberry juice, limoncello, and&nbsp;vodka in this summery cocktail create a sweet and sour beverage ideal for enjoying in the warm weather.
name: Raspberry Limoncello
recipeIngredient: 2 oz. Club soda or sparkling water (optional)

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the raspberry juice, limoncello, vodka, simple syrup, lemon juice, and ice in a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the raspberry juice, limoncello, vodka, simple syrup, lemon juice, and ice in a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a glass over fresh ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a glass over fresh ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top off with club soda and stir gently.
